title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 605.4 - Regulations governing students
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 605.4 - Regulations governing students

State Regulations

All student organizations on community college campuses
shall file with the president or designee, a certification which is
satisfactory to the president or designee, that the constitution, bylaws, policies, regulations and practices of the organization offer open membership
on a nondiscriminatory basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
605.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
